review: This thing is fantastic.  I used a Chromecast on my bedroom tv for a few months and found its interface cumbersome.  I got frustrated and decided  to give the Fire TV Stick a try, and I won't be going back.  The remote is small, yet capable.  I highly recommend this!
author: Rick Guy

review: This is a lot faster than trying to connect through the T.V.  It is easy to navigate and the set up walks you through everything.  I brought this on vacation though and attempted to use this in our hotel. I was able to connect to the WiFi but the hotel also had a web page that needed the terms accepted, and I could not do this (or access any web page) with the Fire TV stick.  It was very unfortunate since we had planned on watching Netflix for the three weeks we were gone.
